I am not the first to investigate language acquisition. Many have preeced me, and I hope many will follow---unfortunately, the present thesis has not solved language acquisition, the reader may be surprised to learn so soon. Though, I believe I have been one of the most privileged to do so. My privileges have taken the shape of people, and I want to spend some lines to make them part of this book.
